description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Add some light to your life by letting your screen fill the room with beautiful colors of your choice! This special light app has a variety of modes suitable for different occasions. E.G:  Heart - For romantic dinners. Stroboscope-For crazy parties. Clock-As a nice digital/analog clock. Flowers-As color changing art. It also has classic RGB etc.. Customize the modes by using special meters.
